original_text: And the king of Assyria found conspiracy in Hoshea: for he had sent messengers to So king of Egypt, and brought no present to the king of Assyria, as he had done year by year: therefore the king of Assyria shut him up, and bound him in prison.
korean_text: 그가 애굽의 왕 소에게 사자들을 보내고 해마다 하던 대로 앗수르 왕에게 조공을 드리지 아니하매 앗수르 왕이 호세아가 배반함을 보고 그를 옥에 감금하여 두고

sentences.original_text: And the king of Assyria found conspiracy in Hoshea:
for he had sent messengers to So king of Egypt,
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 애굽 왕 소에게 사자들을 보내고

sentences.original_text: and brought no present to the king of Assyria,
as he had done year by year:
sentences.korean_translation: 매년 행하던 것 같이 하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: therefore the king of Assyria shut him up,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 앗수르 왕이 그를 잡아 가두고
